result.execSummary:
The defendant Michael Allen LaPointe was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Battery by Prisoners, a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 940.20(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Sentence withheld:  DE placed on 3 years probation concurrent with jail sentence being currently served, conditions: $518 costs-  Def. must provide DNA sample and pay applicable $ 250 surcharge which is included in the costs.   Complete any counseling deemed appropriate by agent.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Michael Allen LaPointe in court with attorney Jeffrey Lawrence Kemp.  Bruce Robert Poquette appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
DE advised of rights and penalties; DE waives rights; parties stipulate to facts.  DA states victim rights legislation has been complied with.  
DE pleads Guilty.  Found Guilty.  Sentence withheld:  DE placed on 3 years probation concurrent with jail sentence being currently served, conditions: $518 costs-  Def. must provide DNA sample and pay applicable $ 250 surcharge which is included in the costs.   Complete any counseling deemed appropriate by agent.

Defendant Michael Allen LaPointe in court with attorney Jeffrey Lawrence Kemp.  Bruce Robert Poquette appeared for the State of Wisconsin.    Acknowledges receipt of Information.  Advised of rights.  Hearing proceeds to Plea/sentencing-

Defendant Michael Allen LaPointe in court with attorney Jeffrey Lawrence Kemp.  Bruce Robert Poquette appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  DE wishes to waive prelim.  Court finds he has freely waived prelim - finds probable cause and binds DE over for Trial.  Arraignment scheduled for September 6, 2016 at 10:00 am.

Defendant Michael Allen LaPointe in court via video with attorney Jeffrey Lawrence Kemp.  Defendant Michael Allen LaPointe in custody.  Bruce Robert Poquette appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Bond will continue.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for July 5, 2016 at 01:15 pm.
Defendant's Demand for discovery and inspection

Scheduling conference on May 31, 2016 at 10:00 am.
Note:  Notices were sent to both attorneys Jarvis and Kemp.

Defendant Michael Allen LaPointe in court.  Bruce Robert Poquette appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  OFF THE RECORD.
 DE states he is represented by Atty Jeffrey Kemp who does not appear for this hearing.  Reset.   DE signed bond in court which he previously refused to sign.  Scheduling conference scheduled for May 31, 2016 at 10:00 am.

Defendant Michael Allen LaPointe in court with attorney Jeffrey Lawrence Kemp by phone.  Defendant Michael Allen LaPointe in custody appeared by video.  Bruce Poquette appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant advised of rights/penalties, acknowledges receipt of complaint, waives reading of complaint.   DEF waives time limits for preliminary hearing.   SIBS  $5000  Scheduling conference scheduled for April 26, 2016 at 01:30 pm.
Michael A LaPointe by M Woller # 399
